name: Electron dash
description:
In this game you play as an electron and your main goal is to supply power to the entire circuit and reach the positive terminal.

mechanics

--------------------------------

You have the ability to leave a super position at any point. This allows you to apply power to a certain part of a circuit without being there.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

For any physics and electronics experts you'll notice that this game doesn't follow most of the laws of electricity

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This game  game is my submission to the Zambian game jam so beware if an incomplete mess. The game is subject to change in the later future as i see some hope for it. please tell me what you think in the comments.
